room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Had so much fun with the family!! We came sooo close to escaping The Valley of the Kings room! Highly recommend this.

room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Great team building! We had a blast and Eric was great. We did the Valley of the Kings and we are already making plans for our next visit! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: I absolutely enjoyed Valley of the Kings, one of the funnest puzzle rooms! I will definitely be back to try the others!

room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: Must do if you are in Reno! Fun, fun, fun! Mel was a great guide for the experience. We had fun as a family trying to work out the clues. We ended up “cursed” but it was so worth the experience. We plan to come back in the summer and try a different room.

room_title: Escape room " Valley of the Kings" by Puzzle Room Reno in Reno
review: One of the best room we played ever! We are crazy about escape rooms and have played more than 50 around the World. This is probably our most favorite room ever. They have it in 2 different locations- one in Reno and one in Tahoe. The Tahoe one is the best. We tried Asylum in a reno and that one is amazing as well.
